title: Mastering Corporate Law Contract Elements: Microlearning via 2D Animation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Short-term training for managerial roles conducted in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners distinguish and explain the four essential elements of a valid contract (offer, acceptance, consideration, intention to create legal relations) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners analyze contract dispute cases based on animated case videos and provide appropriate legal judgment criteria.
Learners achieve over 70% scores in quiz assessments after watching five 5-minute micro-content videos in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
